footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Sethos | Update Date: 06/09/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Slingshot__
The best weapon, only losing by a tiny margin to Hunter's Path.
__Hunter’s Path__
Difficult weapon to even try pull for.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Aqua Simulacra, The First Great Magic__
If you for some reason have them but not Slingshot, you can use them too.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery or Energy Recharge%|<goblet> Electro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge (see notes)|CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate|Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Secret Rite - Twilight Shadowpiercer
**2)** Normal Attack: Royal Reed Archery
**3)** Elemental Skill: Ancient Rite - The Thundering Sands

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Energy Requirements__
With Fischl, 1-2 skills per rotation: 100%
With an Electro teammate: 120-160% (depends on the teammate and number of skills per rotation)
Without anyone: 160%

__Desert Pavilion Chronicle__
When under the Elemental Burst, the Attack Speed and Normal Attack DMG Bonus% make the set viable.
